data.title: Visit Isles of Scilly
data.meta_description: Stay in a traditional Scillonian granite cottage, a converted barn, a farmhouse, a chalet or something more modern. From stunning 5-star Gold Award homes to more modest 2-star accommodation, our…
data.text:
Stay in a traditional Scillonian granite cottage, a converted barn, a farmhouse, a chalet or something more modern. From stunning 5-star Gold Award homes to more modest 2-star accommodation, our wide-ranging self-catering accommodation on the Isles of Scilly has something for everyone; from couples to extended families, and to suit every taste and budget.

Most provide Wi-Fi and some allow dogs. All of them will provide you with a perfect bolt hole from which to enjoy your holiday.
